senses.sense_definition: To ski using the <w>wedeln</w> style, characterized by making a series of short, quick, rhythmic turns without checking speed.

examples.text: Advanced skiers often <w>wedel</w> down the steep slope to maintain a consistent rhythm.
It took him several seasons to learn to <w>wedel</w> gracefully through the moguls.

senses.sense_definition: A skiing technique, also known as <w>wedeln</w>, involving a series of short, quick turns.

examples.text: The instructor demonstrated a perfect <w>wedel</w> on the fresh snow.
Her <w>wedel</w> has improved significantly since she started taking private lessons.

senses.sense_definition: A town located in the Pinneberg district of Schleswig-Holstein, Germany.

examples.text: We visited the famous ship greeting station in <w>Wedel</w> last summer.
The train ride from Hamburg to <w>Wedel</w> takes about forty minutes.
